$eref.description: Coordinates representing the 'visual center' of an image. The X axis is horizontal line and the Y axis the vertical line, with 0,0 being the LEFT, TOP of the image.
$eref.title: Focal Point

___x.description: The coordinate point on the horizontal axis

___y.description: The coordinate point on the vertical axis

description: An object for overrides for images when images are used in a gallery. Example usage: Each image in a gallery may have the images own focal point overridden by the gallery.
title: Has gallery properties
